title: U.S.- employment by industry 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
Industry Education and health services has the highest Employment in thousands and Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction has the lowest Employment in thousands.
The lowest value at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction is 47.86x times less than the highest value at Education and health services.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Employment in thousands in the y axis.
The Employment in thousands is highest at Industry Education and health services and lowest at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
Industry Education and health services has the highest Employment in thousands and Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction has the lowest Employment in thousands.
The lowest value at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction is 47.86x times less than the highest value at Education and health services.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
Industry Education and health services has the highest Employment in thousands and Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction has the lowest Employment in thousands.
Industry Wholesale and retail trade has the second highest value for Employment in thousands.
The lowest value at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction is 47.86x times less than the highest value at Education and health services.
Employment in thousands at Industry Education and health services is 35894.0 , second place is Wholesale and retail trade at 19742.0, and thirdly is Professional and business services at 19606.0.
The Industry Education and health services has 2.96 times more Employment in thousands than average.
Summing up the values of all Industrys, we get total 157538.0.
